caption.p: Comparison of macrophage activation of HMR, ginseng and wild simulated ginseng. RAW264.7 cells were treated with HMR (25 μg/ml), G (25 μg/ml) or WSG (25 μg/ml) for 24 hr. NO level and mRNA level were investigated using Griess assay and RT‐PCR, respectively. * p < .05 compared to the cells without the sample treatment
